TopicTitle: How do we add more than one item at once?

Articles.Content: I have watched some tutorials and stuff and I've seen people adding more than one item at once (same item) for items like engines. I'm on PS4 how do we do this?

There is a button in the editor for changing "symmetry". In the VAB, you can change symmetry to add 2, 3, 4, 6, or 8 parts at one time -- just as long as the parts are added symmetrically around your rocket.

You may be referring to the PC's version of using the "Alt-" key before selecting a stack of components, which selects the stack and allows new placement without removing the original parts.

All that said, I have no idea which button on the PS4 maps to the Alt- key on PC, but that might be what you're looking for...
